channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description:
i have been working on trying to figure out safe zones for a couple days a no LUCK!! i defintaly cant do a big square yet, so i went ahead and tried a small place like the draynor bank. [code](absX >=3092 && absX <=3095 && absY >=3246 && absY <=3240 )||[/code] That is what i have came up with so far... but of course it doesnt work, does anyone know what i am doing wrong??
[code]Search
nonwildin your client.java and once found add this at the end of the others like this -
(absX >= coord && absX <= coord && absY >= coord && absY <=coord ) || The first X is connected to the 2nd Y and so on.
[/code] i have tryed ^ but no sucsess...
[code](absX >=bottom left && absX <=top right && absY >=bottom left && absY <=top right ) [/code] and this ^ and no sucsess....
*FFS if you know please let me know!*[br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2007, 07:35:34 PM[/size][hr]no help?

item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2007, 09:02:05 PM[/size][hr]ok so, it still says wildy in red on the screen and i try to attack, at first it says your not in the wild
but them after a few seconds he can hit u back and u hit him back?!

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

It might help if you face North, But heres the picture…
and try the command ::coordson , and to turn em off ::coordsoff
X-Black, Y- Red
Varrock Sq

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Please don’t double post …

FYI …

(absX >= lowest x coord && absX <= highest x coord && absY >= lowest y coord && absY <= highest y coord)

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones

item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

i have been working on trying to figure out safe zones for a couple days a no LUCK!!
i defintaly cant do a big square yet, so i went ahead and tried a small place like
the draynor bank.

(absX >=3092  && absX <=3095 && absY >=3246  && absY <=3240 )||

That is what i have came up with so far… but of course it doesnt work, does anyone
know what i am doing wrong??

[code]Search

nonwildin your client.java and once found add this at the end of the others like this -

(absX >= coord && absX <= coord && absY >= coord && absY <=coord ) ||
The first X is connected to the 2nd Y and so on.

[/code]
i have tryed ^ but no sucsess…

(absX >=bottom left && absX <=top right && absY >=bottom left && absY <=top right )

and this ^ and no sucsess…

FFS if you know please let me know![br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2007, 07:35:34 PM[/size][hr]no help?
